### Color.FromHex method
</br>


#### Gets the hexadecimal (RRGGBB) representation of a color.

```csharp
public static string FromHex(Color value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The color to convert. |

### Return Value

Hexadecimal string without leading '#'.
